no.uio.duo

Class TraverseDSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.uio.duo.TraverseDSpace
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MetadataCleanup, MultiFileAnalyser, PolicyMigration

    public abstract class TraverseDSpace
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility base class for scripts that want to be able to traverse the whole of DSpace, or parts of it. This class solves the issue of handling workflow and workspace items too. Choose your entry point, and then this class will iterate down from there, passing through each community/sub-community/collection/item/workflow item/workspace item Subclasses should at least implement processItem, but may override any of the other methods too. This class also handles aborting and completing the context, if desired

      • TraverseDSpace

        public TraverseDSpace(java.lang.String epersonEmail)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a new utility which traverses DSpace. This will not manage the context for you, so if you use this one you need to manage the context yourself.
        Parameters:
        epersonEmail -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • TraverseDSpace

        public TraverseDSpace(java.lang.String epersonEmail,
                      boolean manageContext)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Create an instance of the object, where the context will be initialised around the eperson account provided. if manageContext is true, the utility will also abort or complete the context at the end of the run
        Parameters:
        epersonEmail -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
